detail_desc: Round shoulder bag with a shimmering metallic finish, glittery appliqué, zip at the top and narrow shoulder strap. Lined. Width 4 cm, diameter approx. 13 cm.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups to lift and shape the bust and a small opening at the front with support panels and narrow satin ribbon ties. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide, elasticated lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
High-waisted shorts in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with pleats at the top, two buttons and a zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and a sturdy, detachable tie belt.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. One pair with a rubber print.
Short, A-line skirt in a sturdy, textured weave with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Satin inner skirt.
Shorts in stretch, printed denim with covered elastication at the waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Fine-knit trainer socks with decorative elastication at the top.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and a seam at the hem with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Platform trainers with a padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 4.5 cm.
Jacket in woven fabric with shawl lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Trousers in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a high waist that is elasticated at the back, side pockets, and wide, straight legs with a high slit centre front.
V-neck body in jersey with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist. High-cut back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Jumper in a soft fine cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with a V-neck, seam under the bust and flare to the hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved, stretch shirt in a premium cotton blend with a narrow, turn-down collar. Slim fit – a fitted style with shaping seams at the back.
Plastic swimming goggles with an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening and embroidery at the top. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. T-shirt in soft, patterned organic cotton slub jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Blouse in chiffon with a round neckline with a lace-embroidered trim and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with smocking over the wrists. Partly lined.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline, long, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastener.

Longer-style cardigan in a rib knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, welt side pockets and a zip down the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up and a silicone appliqué at the front.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.

Calf-length dress in chiffon with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front, pin-tucks at the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with narrow trims at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Satin lining.
Calf-length dress in a soft, textured viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, a pleat at the back and a high slit in one side of the hem. Lined at the top.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned weave with a high, frill-trimmed waist, sewn-in tie belt and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with lace. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back.
Large, elasticated imitation leather scrunchie.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Low-necked T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a seam down the back.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, side stripes and ribbed hems.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in superstretch twill with embroidery and worn details. Zip fly and button, and cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Fitted, V-neck dress in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side and a high slit at the back.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in an airy, crinkled, pattern weave with a wide neckline and short, double-flounced sleeves.
Shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.
V-neck top in viscose jersey with short, wide sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Matt tights with extra space for a growing tummy. 40 denier. Some of the polyamide content of the tights is recycled.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, saddle shoulders and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.

Large waist bag in woven fabric with a large zipped compartment at the front, a zipped compartment at the back and a two-part inner compartment. Adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Height 19.5 cm. Width at the widest point 40 cm.
Fitted cold shoulder top in cotton jersey with drawstrings at the shoulders, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves.

V-neck tunic in an airy viscose weave with a small frilled collar and long balloon sleeves with decorative pleats and narrow buttoned cuffs. Lower section with decorative pleats, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Relaxed fit.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Baby Exclusive. Textured top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck, press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Twisted seams at the front and short slits in the sides.

Dress in a supersoft, fine-knit viscose blend with a brushed finish. Round neckline and long raglan sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards. Unlined.
Ribbed polo-neck collar in soft cashmere.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, printed jersey. Top with a round neckline, short sleeves and rounded hem. Longer at the back. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted dress in velour with a patterned mesh top. Cut-out section at the back with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Satin top with a gently draped neckline and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Dog top in striped cotton jersey with an embroidered motif. Hole for the lead at the top.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with ribbing around the neckline.
Vest top in soft, marled jersey with a chest pocket and raw, roll edges around the neckline and armholes.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with elastication and a wide jersey panel at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.

Underwired bikini top with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Shoulder straps that can be tied at the shoulders or back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Handbag in grained imitation leather. Two handles with a chain fastening, a zip at the top and one inner compartment Size 13x28x36.5 cm.
Short dress in stretch lace with short sleeves. a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs, one pair with marbled plastic pendants.Size approx. 2-5 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.
